title: Elegance, grandeur and charm: winners of the 2025 New Zealand architecture awards – in pictures
text:
Elegance, grandeur and charm: winners of the 2025 New Zealand architecture awards – in pictures

Spread across 11 categories, winners include church conversions, bridges and homes set against New Zealand’s wild landscapes

Te Mānia by Stevens Lawson Architects won the hospitality category in the 2025 New Zealand architecture awards. Photograph: Richard Brimmer
summary:
Spread across 11 categories, winners include church conversions, bridges and homes set against New Zealand’s wild landscapes
